full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 121 of 228 797 LC2VMAX4 Alessi - Direct Q. I'm going to redraw the circle for you, Mr. Alessi. A. Yeah. Q. Go ahead. A. So the bathroom had a vanity. And the garden side, it had a -- his toilet was here. This was his closet. This was a steam room, and this was a shower, a double shower. And in here they had a couch. Q. Do you remember what color the couch was? A. I think it was green, if I remember correctly. Q. Okay. Thank you. I'm going to clear that. And now I'm going to circle at the bottom left-hand corner the area labeled housekeeper bedroom. What was that? A. Yes, that was my bedroom. Q. Could you describe where your bedroom was in relation to the master bedroom, please. A. My bedroom was here, and the master bedroom was on the opposite side of the house. Q. Thank you. MS. COMEY: We can take that down. Thank you, Ms. Drescher. I'd like to now show the witness, the Court, the parties what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibit 299. Q. Mr. Alessi, do you recognize what's depicted in this exhibit? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300

This was his closet. This was a steam room, and this was a shower, a double shower. And in here they had a couch. Q. Do you remember what color the couch was? A. I think it was green, if I remember correctly. Q. Okay. Thank you. I'm going to clear that. And now I'm going to circle at the bottom left-hand corner the area labeled housekeeper bedroom. What was that? A. Yes, that was my bedroom. Q. Could you describe where your bedroom was in relation to the master bedroom, please. A. My bedroom was here, and the master bedroom was on the opposite side of the house. Q. Thank you. MS. COMEY: We can take that down. Thank you, Ms. Drescher. I'd like to now show the witness, the Court, the parties what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibit 299. Q. Mr. Alessi, do you recognize what's depicted in this exhibit?
